messages:
Name: Cenk Tosun
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: June 7, 1991
Position: Attacker
Current club: Everton
Premier League clubs played for: Everton, Crystal Palace

Cenk Tosun, the Everton attacker, hasn't been involved in many of the club's Premier League matches in 2021/2022, making one appearance overall and accumulating six minutes of playing time. His one appearance this season came as a substitute.
Tosun last featured in a league game on December 1, playing only five minutes for Everton versus Liverpool in a 4-1 loss.
In last season's Süper Lig, Tosun featured in three games for Beşiktaş, scored three goals and provided one assist.
Tosun returned to Everton in July 2021 after a loan spell at Beşiktaş, for whom he made 99 league appearances in total, scoring 44 goals and providing 11 assists.

It was on January 13, 2018 that Tosun made his league debut, aged 26 years and 220 days, against Tottenham Hotspur. In his Premier League career overall, he has played 55 times in the competition, with 10 goals scored and three assists.
